UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of pleurocidin is retained in Plc-2, a C-terminal 12-amino acid fragment.
Literature.Author: Souza AL, Díaz-Dellavalle P, Cabrera A, Larranaga P, Dalla-Rizza M, De-Simone SG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=52.0µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=43.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25325(MIC=58.0µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=57.0µM)
